content.data:
[Y]Firmware Vectors
[W]Use the jumpblocks wisely.
[c][m.]
[W]Firmware vector calls abstract
[W]lower-level implementation details and
[W]improve portability.
[W]When extending with hardware like M4,
[W]keep interfaces explicit and read
[W]system pointers dynamically.
[c][m.]
[G]- Prefer vector entry points.
[G]- Avoid magic addresses.
[G]- Read current config pointers.
[m][m-]
[Y]REFERENCE
[C]Compatibility is part of technical
[C]quality.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
